caption.p: Phytotoxic activity of M. pulegium leaves (MPLI) and flowers (MPFI) EOs against germination of P. oleracea, and radical elongation of L. sativa and R. sativus 120 h after sowing. Results are the mean of three experiments ± standard deviation. ** p < 0.01, **** p < 0.0001 compared with control (ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s multiple comparison test).
